message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Let's flip the script!  I think 60-40 is fair, with me getting the larger share this time.
Come on, 57.5-42.5 is more than fair, considering inflation!
I'm still holding out for a better deal.  55-45 feels right, especially with inflation biting into my share.
Back to my original offer, it's the best you'll get!
